author: timbeiko
content:
**ACDE tomorrow at 14:00 UTC**
Agenda: https://github.com/ethereum/pm/issues/997
Stream: https://youtube.com/live/FWvi_z1_gB0 

My hope is we can finalize the scope for Pectra on the EL side tomorrow. Thank you to Erigon & Besu for sharing your preferences about the fork scope (and Reth for doing it a while back!). We'll kickoff with an update on how things are going w.r.t. everything that's already included in Pectra, then talk through clients' preferences for the scope. Note that there have been updates posted on the agenda for EIPs 7667, 7623, and 7645.
